contributors.name: Lichen Community Systems Worker Cooperative Canada

scripts.package-all: rm -rf dist/* && npm run package-mac-arm && npm run package-mac-intel && npm run package-win-x64 && npm run package-linux-x64
scripts.create-release-artifacts: npm run package-all && zip -r dist/MovementOSC-darwin-x64.zip dist/MovementOSC-darwin-x64 && zip -r dist/ovementOSC-darwin-arm64.zip dist/MovementOSC-darwin-arm64  && zip -r dist/MovementOSC-win32-x64.zip dist/MovementOSC-win32-x64 -x '*.DS_Store' -x '__MACOSX' && zip -r dist/MovementOSC-linux-x64.zip dist/MovementOSC-linux-x64 -x '*.DS_Store' -x '__MACOSX'
